humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there was only one sentinel lymph node examined and it had no tumor seen in multiple step sections stained with routine and pankeratin immunochemical stains. This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 2, indicating that the N stage is N0, which means no metastatic carcinoma was found in the assessed lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one sentinel lymph node was examined and no tumor was found in multiple step sections stained with routine and pankeratin immunochemical stains. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
